rules_text: Counter target spell if it shares a card type with a permanent you control or a card in your graveyard.
flavor_text: [i]Desiring none of her suitors, the princess set them on a test to bring her items of unsurpassed rarity- quietly concealing that she already possessed the only specimens known to exist.[/i]
